text: was a Japanese politician. He was the Governor of Okinawa Prefecture from 10 December 2014 to his death in 2018. Before this, he served four terms as the Mayor of Naha from November 2000 until December 2014. Onaga died on 8 August 2018 from pancreatic cancer, aged 67. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Japanese mayors Category:Governors of Japanese prefectures Category:Politicians from Okinawa Prefecture
title: Takeshi Onaga
